step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Try to keep your shoulders and elbows more stable as you inhale and tighten your body.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows steady during this step.
Great effort on the inhale and muscle tightening! Aim for more stillness in your shoulders and elbows as you visualize the fluid movement.
Excellent job relaxing your muscles on the exhale. Continue to focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows stable as you visualize pushing fluid out.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with deep breathing to help your lymphatic system. Remember to keep your body still, especially your shoulders and elbows, as you inhale and exhale. This helps the fluid move effectively.
